title: Asking nicely for advice on skins
body:
I will get straight to the point.WHICH skin should I get out of these champions.It can't be ultimate
ty very much pp.

replies.body: Get a skin that makes you feel like the strong, powerful, independent woman that you are.
You can still feel like an independent woman even if you are a boy.
This is true. I speak from experience.

> [{quoted}](name=vhumy2001,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=pkAWZOuO,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-12-12T02:57:00.940+0000)
>
> I will get straight to the point.WHICH skin should I get out of these champions.It can't be ultimate
> ty very much pp.

I have lunar goddess, bunny(?), police and arcade. All of them are good, but I main diana.

I am pretty good with diana,but it all comes down to which one is the best
And out of di,cait,tee and lux,I never seen a bunny skin.(Except teemo)
Lunar Goddess Diana has some cool particle effects with her abilities. Personally, I'd get that skin out of the others, but that's because I play her, and not much of the others.
At the end of the day it all comes down to personal preference, just pick a skin you like.

Maybe that's the best option...
But I need reviews first
ty anyway
I'm partial to Lunar Goddess Diana, and the Magical Girl Lux skins out of those champs. Teemo's Legendary skin, the Omega Squad skin is great, but you said you don't want to get one that pricey.

Im ok as long as it is not legendary
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
